Method.name: LoadAll
Method.Implementation: s sc=##class(Forum.TopicsLoader).Load(forum) if $$$ISERR(sc) q sc s sc=##class(%DeepSee.Utils).%BuildCube("History") if $$$ISERR(sc) q sc s sc=##class(%DeepSee.Utils).%BuildCube("PostAnalytics") if $$$ISERR(sc) q sc s sc=##class(%DeepSee.Utils).%BuildCube("TopicAnalytics") q sc

Method.name: UpdateAll
Method.Implementation: s sc=##class(Forum.TopicsUpdater).Update(forum) if $$$ISERR(sc) q sc s sc=##class(%DeepSee.Utils).%BuildCube("History") if $$$ISERR(sc) q sc s sc=##class(%DeepSee.Utils).%BuildCube("PostAnalytics") if $$$ISERR(sc) q sc s sc=##class(%DeepSee.Utils).%BuildCube("TopicAnalytics") q sc
